name: Empyrean Frontier
description: Empyrean Frontier is an epic real time strategy game that mixes classic RTS gameplay with a multi-stage campaign in which the player commands a persistent fleet of ships through a galactic map. Boss battles, base building, planet destroying superweapons, and tactical skirmishes create a unique blend of genres.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Dual core 2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 capable graphics card Storage: 2 GB available space
